xrpl_nft_summary.description: Native NFTs (XLS-20) for unique digital assets. Requires NonFungibleTokensV1_1 amendment.

key_features.nft_object: Unique NFToken with ID, URI, flags (burnable, transferable, onlyXRP).
key_features.minting: NFTokenMint transaction; issuer sets immutable properties.
key_features.ownership: Stored in NFTokenPage (up to 32 per account).
key_features.trading: NFTokenCreateOffer for buy/sell; accept with NFTokenAcceptOffer.
key_features.transfer_fees: Issuer can set % fee on sales if transferable.
key_features.restrictions: Non-transferable NFTs can't be traded for tokens.

xrpl_nft_summary.usage: Mint with NFTokenMint; trade via offers; burn if burnable. Supports collections, auctions, batch minting.
